content.rendered:
Rethinking thinking for the twenty-first century

Traditionally, the positive thinking philosophy advocates that you will achieve whatever you want purely by thinking positive thoughts. However, this practice results in success for some individuals but for others it does not!

Author Neil Francis explores the ways of creating new possibilities and rethinks the true meaning of positive thinking to help all those who are struggling to manifest their dreams. The essence of this book is to demonstrate how a different type of positive thinking can open yourself up to new possibilities and help you to
